name: market for flattened bamboo | flattened bamboo | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24664/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the market for flattened bamboo in the Philippines. Transport distances were estimated using the methodology presented in Zea Escamilla and Habert (2017).;Flattened bamboo is produced in a handcrafted process. The main application of flattened bamboo is in load-bearing wall systems, where it is used between bamboo poles to support the soil-cement mortar with which the walls are plastered (Murphy et al., 2004; Zea Escamilla et al., 2013). Flattened bamboo is also used to produce woven bamboo mats. ;;;References:;Murphy, R.J., Trujillo, D., Londoño, X., 2004. Life cycle assessment (LCA) of a Guadua;house. In: International Symposium of Bamboo e Guadua. Pereira, Colombia.;Zea Escamilla, E. and G. Habert, Environmental impacts from the production of bamboo based construction materials representing the global production diversity. Journal of Cleaner Production, 2013.;;;Zea Escamilla, E., Habert, G. Method and application of characterisation of life cycle impact data of construction materials using geographic information systems. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 1210–1219 (2017). https://doi.org/10.1007/s11367-016-1238-y

This dataset starts with flattened bamboo leaving the gate of the producing entity, ready for distribution to consuming entities.

The activity ends with the flattened bamboo being delivered to the consuming entity
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/162:Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials

The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016: p. 1-10.
